definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: part, open wide (NH [[פָּסַק]], Aram. [[פְּסַק]], psaq, all cut, sever, cleave);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[שֲֵׁׂק שְׂפָתָיו]] Pr 13:3 i.e. one talkative.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 fs. [[וַתְּפַשְּׂקִי אֶת־רַגְלַיִח]] Ez Eze 16:23 (c. [[ל]] pers.; sensu obsc.).
